Title: Object: Le repos en Egypte
Series: Galerie du Musée Napoléon
Series: Musée Napoléon
Series: Galerie Napoléon
Series: Galerie du Musée de France
Description: Plate 82: The rest on the flight into Egypt, after Domenichino, with the Virgin gathering water from a stream with a shell, while the infant Baptist hands Christ an apple. c.1804/15 Etching and engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Jean Baptiste Liénard (engraving)
Intermediary draughtsman: Albert Jacob François Gregorius
Curator's comments: From 'Galerie du Musée Napoléon', see 1856,0308.625 for comment. Engraved after the painting now in Riom (Spear 19).
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (7) (Desaulx)
